name: grassroots
description: Political Campaign Software focused on voter outreach and volunteer management.

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start --prefix grassroots-frontend" "npm run start --prefix grassroots-backend"
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix grassroots-frontend && npm run test --prefix grassroots-backend && npm run test --prefix eslint_rules
scripts.check: npx tsc --noEmit --project grassroots-frontend && npx tsc --noEmit --project grassroots-backend && npx tsc --noEmit --project eslint_rules && npx eslint .
scripts.postinstall:
echo '
### Install Backend ###
' && npm install --prefix grassroots-backend && echo '
### Install Frontend ###
' && npm install --prefix grassroots-frontend && echo '
### Build custom eslint rules ###
'&& npm install --prefix eslint_rules && npm run tsc --prefix eslint_rules
